title: Dartmouth AI Conference
overview: The Dartmouth Summer Research Project on Artificial Intelligence introduces the term 'AI' and sets the stage for decades of research in machine intelligence.

title: Deep Blue Beats Kasparov
overview: IBM’s Deep Blue defeats world chess champion Garry Kasparov, marking a milestone in AI's ability to solve complex problems.

title: AlexNet Wins ImageNet
overview: AlexNet, a deep convolutional neural network, wins the ImageNet competition by a large margin, sparking the deep learning revolution.

title: AlphaGo Beats Lee Sedol
overview: DeepMind’s AlphaGo defeats Go champion Lee Sedol, showcasing the power of reinforcement learning and neural networks in mastering complex strategy games.

title: GPT-3 Released
overview: OpenAI releases GPT-3 with 175 billion parameters, setting new benchmarks in natural language processing and text generation.

title: ChatGPT Launched
overview: OpenAI launches ChatGPT, making conversational AI accessible to the public and driving widespread adoption of AI assistants.

title: GPT-4 Released
overview: OpenAI introduces GPT-4, further advancing reasoning, creativity, and coding abilities in large language models.

title: Generative AI Boom
overview: Generative AI adoption accelerates across industries, integrating into software, media, and enterprise workflows, marking AI's mainstream integration.
